text: The Haima 7X is a MPV made by Haima since 2020 it replaced the Haima F7. == History and Features == The Haima 7X was first shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2019. and was launched in August 2020. the 7X was designed by the Italian design house Pininfarina. the MPV's design was inspired by the concept Haima VF00 shown at the Auto China in April 2018. it has seven seats and a 1.6 liter turbo petrol engine with a 6-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Haima 7X is sold mainly in the Chinese market but it was showcased at the Auto Expo in Greater Noida in 2020 previewing a possible future entry of Haima and 7X's sale in the Indian market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Haima 7X
